## Chapter 2: Data Structures

### Useful Commands in Chapter

str()

typeof()

### 2.1.1 Atomic Vectors + 2.1.1.1 Types and tests

```{r}
dbl_var <- c(1,2.5,4.5)
typeof(dbl_var)
str(dbl_var)
is.double(dbl_var)
is.atomic(dbl_var)
is.numeric(dbl_var)

dbl_var2<-c(1,2,3)
typeof(dbl_var2)
str(dbl_var2)
is.integer(dbl_var2)

int_var<- c(1L, 2L, 3L)
typeof(int_var)
str(int_var)
is.integer(int_var)

log_var <- c(TRUE, FALSE, T, F)
typeof(log_var)
str(log_var)
is.logical(log_var)

char_var<-c("these are", "some Strings")
typeof(char_var)
str(char_var)
is.character(char_var)
```
